# owidapi

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

 Retrieve datasets from Our World in Data (OWID) [Chart API and ETL Catalog API](https://docs.owid.io/projects/etl/api/).


## Installation

You can install the development version of `owidapi` from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("tidy-intelligence/r-owidapi")
```
